channel.title: Vim on Bits and Blocks
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on Bits and Blocks

item.title: Why Choose Vim
item.description: TLDR Choosing a text editor is a very personal decision. You grow with your editor, as your editor grows with you. As I use my text editor more and more over the years, I’m constantly constantly learning new techniques for working more efficiently. Some of them stick, others are forgotten. I find that sequences and shortcuts that I most use stay. But just as importantly VIM accommodates my changing needs through configuration, plugin, or otherwise.
